title: They really need to buff Fiddlesticks
body:
He needs some love. How about some crowed control on his ult?

And don't give me any of those strawman arguments or I'll bale on you.

replies.body:
Well.

You reap what you sow I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=Alzon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-11-14T14:35:49.896+0000)
>
> Reading this was draining.

Thank you for adding to the actual PUN. This is not in gameplay for a reason!

I wish everyone would notice that _mark_ next to the post title that says “Memes and Games.”  Then maybe we wouldn’t have so many people _crowing_ up a _storm_ with your typical tilted Gameplay comments.  I don’t like having to _dash_ through the gauntlet of salt to find the actual joke.  Sometimes it takes so long, I wish I had my _stopwatch_ ticking just to have some data to back up my argument with.

> [{quoted}](name=Alzon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2018-11-14T20:24:43.068+0000)
>
> I wish everyone would notice that _mark_ next to the post title that says “Memes and Games.”  Then maybe we wouldn’t have so many people _crowing_ up a _storm_ with your typical tilted Gameplay comments.  I don’t like having to _dash_ through the gauntlet of salt to find the actual joke.  Sometimes it takes so long, I wish I had my _stopwatch_ ticking just to have some data to back up my argument with.

I think it's about time we clock out. When a fiddles ults into an enemy Heimerdinger and a Rengar and uses zhonyas, in that brief period is he a crowdinger's cat?
Yes and no.  It won’t settle on either until the Zhonya’s ends.

> [{quoted}](name=Alzon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-14T20:37:07.190+0000)
>
> Yes and no.  You won’t find out until the Zhonya’s ends.

Precisely!

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-14T10:10:24.120+0000)
>
> He needs some love. How about some crowed control on his ult?
> 
> And don't give me any of those strawman arguments or I'll bale on you.

I fear you may be right.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-14T10:10:24.120+0000)
>
> He needs some love. How about some crowed control on his ult?
> 
> And don't give me any of those strawman arguments or I'll bale on you.

He is not "Outstanding in his field" anymore.
What? You probably have no brain.

> [{quoted}](name=Trias000,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-11-14T21:04:13.962+0000)
>
> What? You probably have no brain.

But soon, neither will you!

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-14T10:10:24.120+0000)
>
> He needs some love. **How about some crowed control on his ult?**
> 
> And don't give me any of those strawman arguments or I'll bale on you.

I haven't played fiddle in ages but I'm pretty sure his ult still fears enemy champions after a short duration

Although, I do agree that he needs a buff.

> [{quoted}](name=Projectile Vomit,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4EfXmmGe,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-14T14:33:25.523+0000)
>
> I haven't played fiddle in ages but I'm pretty sure his ult still fears enemy champions after a short duration
> 
> Although, I do agree that he needs a buff.

Crow-ed control. CROW CAW CAW ult. >:(
Oh my god. Most of you didn't get my puns!

I would upvote but I'm physically incapable of upvoting anyone who says "Buff Fiddle", ironically or not.

I'm sorry. ;-;
He could really use a rework which can see him potentially become pretty badass.

> And don't give me any of those strawman arguments or I'll bale on you.

Upvoted!

Not sure why this is in memes and games, I do agree that he needs some love.  They should make the heal on his W a tad stronger IMO.
Needs higher base damage on his max level abilities. He rapidly decomposes at 30 minutes.
